Pleasley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
pleasley-contest
None
Donizetti [arr. Round]
Pleasley, Derbyshire 1st prize £8.10s. and cup, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Hucknall Temperance, 2nd (10s.) Kirkby United. Best trombone - J.Salt, Hucknall Temperance. 6 bands competed.
